heading: 2. With effect from 1 January 2024, the number of statutory sick leave
text_raw:
2. With effect from 1 January 2024, the number of statutory sick leave 
days to which an employee is entitled to in a year provided for in section 5(2) 
of the Sick Leave Act 2022 (No. 24 of 2022) shall be up to and including 5. 

GIVEN under my hand, 
 1 January 2024 

NEALE RICHMOND, 
 Minister of State at the Department of Enterprise, Trade and 

Employment 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 19th January, 2024.

EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

The purpose of this Order is to increase the minimum statutory sick leave days 
provided for under the Sick Leave Act 2022 from three days to five days. This 
will have the effect of ensuring that an employee with an entitlement to 
statutory sick leave will be entitled to up to and including five days’ employerpaid sick leave per year.
